interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Eye Mask for Puffy Eyes,Under Eye Patches,Dark Circles Under Eye Treatment,Eye Masks& Puffy Eyes Treatment, Eye Mask for Dark Circles（60 PCS)
Review Date: 2019/09/17
Store: Mourvibe
Average Rating: 3.0
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '3 x 3 x 1.5 inches; 6.07 Ounces', 'UPC': '778365190505'}
Review Text: I'm not sure if how I applied it is what made it not work or if the product just doesn't work at all.  There was no directions on how to use the product which is the reason for the 1 star it might have been more but I could not get over the fact that it did not come with instructions.  No instructions on the jar, no instructions in the mailing envelope at all.  How are you supposed to know who to apply, when to apply or how to take it off.  I did try and it didn't work but that could because I put it on wrong because again there was NO instructions included with this product.
Review Title: Did not work on my puff eyes
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary**

- **Hair Care Enthusiast:** Demonstrates a keen interest in products that enhance and revive hairstyles, with a strong focus on hair health and maintenance.
- **Control in Application:** Prefers products that allow for precise control over application, seeking lightweight options that do not overwhelm the hair.
- **Practical Utility:** Appreciates functionality and practicality, opting for items that serve specific purposes for hair revitalization rather than just aesthetics. This trend extends to other personal care products, indicating a broader preference for effective solutions.
- **Quality Conscious:** Engages with quality products and reliable brands, as shown by a high average rating for items purchased, although their disappointment in a recent purchase highlights that lack of instructions can significantly impact their experience.
- **Critical Review Tendencies:** Although generally optimistic, as reflected in high ratings for effective hair care products, the user is willing to provide critical feedback when expectations are not met. Recent interactions demonstrate that they place strong importance on user guidance, as the absence of instructions can lead to dissatisfaction. 

Overall, the user values effectiveness, control, and quality across personal care products, reflecting a thoughtful approach to their grooming and maintenance routine, while emphasizing the importance of clear product usage instructions.
